lines.text: Maybe I belong in a cage.
I can't stand trial! I have to avoid people, conflict! I change! I change.
I was sighted until I was fourteen. I remember green.
I am a person with rights! How dare you take them away! Just you the hell do you think you are?
I'm a doctor. I would like to have a look at your eyes.
You doctors know nothing of radiation.
I happen to know a lot about it.
Good luck. You take my secret with you"
And I leave mine with you. I have a brother in the world now.

[Opening titles showing flashbacks to the Pilot episode experiment and transformation]
In each of us there lives a kind of beast... made of rage. Years ago I used science to study this beast... to bring him out of me. I used gamma radiation to release him... but I used too much... far too much. Now the beast is out of my control... emerging whenever anger stikes. My name is David Banner... the world thinks I'm dead... I travel alone... I try to keep the beast caged within myself...
